mapper.select: select JQMC,sum(JDRSWRC) as JDRSWRC,sum(LJJDRSWRC) as LJJDRSWRC from "GP_SZZF_O"."JC_QSJQJDQKYBB" where to_char(TBSJ,'yyyy-mm') = #{date} group by JQMC

select ifnull(sum(LJJDRSWRC),0) as jdrs, ifnull(sum(LJZHSRWY),0) as zsr, (select ifnull(sum(MPZSR),0) from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_QSJQJDQKYBB" where year(TBSJ) = #{date}) as mpsr from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_QSJQJDQKYBB" where TBSJ = (select max(TBSJ) from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_QSJQJDQKYBB" where year(TBSJ) = #{date})
select JQMC,ifnull(LJJDRSWRC,0) as jdrs from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_QSJQJDQKYBB" where TBSJ =(select max(TBSJ) from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_QSJQJDQKYBB") order by LJJDRSWRC desc

select aa.JQMC, sum(case aa.mon when '1' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as one, sum(case aa.mon when '2' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as two, sum(case aa.mon when '3' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as three, sum(case aa.mon when '4' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as four, sum(case aa.mon when '5' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as five, sum(case aa.mon when '6' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as six, sum(case aa.mon when '7' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as seven, sum(case aa.mon when '8' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as eight, sum(case aa.mon when '9' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as nine, sum(case aa.mon when '10' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as ten , sum(case aa.mon when '11' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as eleven, sum(case aa.mon when '12' then aa.JDRSWRC else 0 end) as twelve from ( select JQMC,JDRSWRC,month(TBSJ) as mon from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_QSJQJDQKYBB" where year(TBSJ) = #{date} )aa group by aa.JQMC

select aa.JQMC, sum(case aa.mon when '1' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as one, sum(case aa.mon when '2' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as two, sum(case aa.mon when '3' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as three, sum(case aa.mon when '4' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as four, sum(case aa.mon when '5' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as five, sum(case aa.mon when '6' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as six, sum(case aa.mon when '7' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as seven, sum(case aa.mon when '8' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as eight, sum(case aa.mon when '9' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as nine, sum(case aa.mon when '10' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as ten , sum(case aa.mon when '11' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as eleven, sum(case aa.mon when '12' then aa.ZHSRWY else 0 end) as twelve from ( select JQMC,ZHSRWY,month(TBSJ) as mon from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_QSJQJDQKYBB" where year(TBSJ) = 2021 )aa group by aa.JQMC

select month(TBSJ) as month, sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_WGR) as WGR, sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_XG) as XG, sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_AM) as AM, sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_HJ_TW) as TW from "GP_SZZF_O"."JC_LYTJZYZBYBB" where year(TBSJ) = #{date} group by month(TBSJ)

select ifnull(sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_WGR),0) as WGR, ifnull(sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_XG),0) as XG, ifnull(sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_AM),0) as AM, ifnull(sum(RJYZB_1ZBYLJJDRJRS_HJ_TW),0) as TW from "GP_SZZF_O"."JC_LYTJZYZBYBB" where year(TBSJ) = #{date}
select LYGYJDRSWRC, LYSRWY, LYTSLG, LYTSBJLG, LYTSBJL, LXSJ, LYZSSSJ, LYZSCWSZ, LYGWCSJ, LYYYCSJ from "GP_SZZF_O"."JC_NDTBBSFQ" where ND = #{date};
select JQMC,ifnull(sum(TBCLSL),0) SL as from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_TCCSLTJ" group by JQMC

select '注册导游数量' as name,count(*) as sl from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_DYXX" union all select '互联网上网服务营业场所' as name,count(*) as sl from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_YYCS" union all select '旅行社数量' as name,count(*) as sl from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_LYSXX" union all select '其他娱乐场数量' as name,count(*) as sl from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_YLCSDJXX"
select JB,count(*) as SL from "GP_SZZF_O"."A_WWBHDW" group by JB
